GSD.description:
udmabuf: Set the DMA mask for the udmabuf device (v2)

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.141 by commit 872875c9ecf8fa2e1d82bb2f2f1963f571aa8959. For more details please see the references link.
